name: OCTOPUS MICROFINANCE
overview:
Octopus Microfinance is one of the foremost providers of MIS technology for microfinance institutions.

Octopus covers fully most of the functionalities required by CGAP (see here: http://www.octopusnetwork.org/product/technical-coverage).

Octopus is a comprehensive MIS solution that supports all aspects of your microfinance operations. With flexible and intuitive technology, our clients benefit from improved loan, savings portfolio management, interactive client relationship management, integrated accounting and proactive risk management. Founded on best practices principles, Octopus brings tangible value-added benefits to your microfinance operations.

Octopus a global product: since 2006, Octopus has successfully assisted 80 institutions in 60 countries. Octopus suits retail banking operations: our international clients range from greenfield institutions to established Tier2, Tier3, and Tier4 microfinance organisations.

Since recently, Octopus is browser-based, as we have developed a platform via the SaaS technology.

Octopus offers an interface based on classical Windows visual that makes it obvious to use. Octopus is compatible with the MS Office Suite, all the reports being exportable to Excel files.

Octopus is also widely used in the Islamic microfinance sector, in particular in Central Asia and Afghanistan.

You may get more details about on our website: http://www.octopusnetwork.org/
